settings.title: Oncology-Based
settings.text: Oncologist and naturopath researched to promote lifelong wellness after cancer treatment.

settings.title: Survivor Specific
settings.text: Science-backed ingredients focused on survivors' unique nutritional gaps & safety needs.

settings.title: Pharmacist Approved
settings.text: Reviewed for survivor safety, research-based full dosing, and optimal bioavailability.

settings.title: Superior Quality
settings.text: Manufactured in FDA-registered, cGMP-certified USA facilities and triple tested for purity and consistency in dosing.

settings.title: No Hidden Ingredients
settings.text: All ingredients and dosages are transparently listed for full review with your doctor and healthcare team.

settings.title: Simple Routine
settings.text: An easy-to-remember routine with daily AM and PM personalized supplement packets.

settings.title: Research  You Can Trust
settings.content: Our experts combined research from Western science and Eastern healing methods to find ingredients that safely support specific cancer survivors' whole body health.

settings.title: Guidance You Can Count On
settings.content: Take our oncologist-designed quiz for a personalized wellness routine, or choose from one of our expert-curated, cancer-specific WellSurvivor supplement packs.

settings.title: Routines You Can Depend On
settings.content: Simplify your daily routine with a 4-week supplement subscription, featuring personalized AM and PM packets. Easily change, pause, or cancel anytime.

settings.subheading: The benefits you've been searching for

settings.heading: Set Your Nutritional Goals
settings.text: A survivor-focused daily multi-supplement routine with 7 functional mushrooms, premiere botanicals, vitamins, minerals,  and more.

settings.heading: Energize Your Day, Every Day
settings.text: Enhance energy levels and help manage occasional fatigue for all-day stamina.*

settings.heading: Strengthen Your Immune Support
settings.text: Support your body's natural defenses and cellular health to promote overall wellness and vitality.*

settings.heading: Live Stronger, Brighter, Healthier
settings.text: Promote natural resilience and inflammatory function to help your body thrive every day.*
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

settings.title: WellSurvivor All Survivors
settings.content: Enhances immunity, cognition, mood balance, focus, energy, and more for all cancer survivors*

settings.title: WellSurvivor Breast
settings.content: Supports healthy breast tissue, immunity, helps manage hot flashes, and more for breast cancer survivors*

settings.title: WellSurvivor Prostate
settings.content: Promotes prostate function, urinary health, healthy aging, and more for prostate cancer survivors*

settings.title: WellSurvivor GYN
settings.content: Support for DNA health, mood, and immunity for uterine, cervical, and ovarian cancer survivors*

settings.title: SurvivorRx Immunity Plus
settings.content: Formulated for anyone looking to support immunity, inflammation management, and more*

settings.heading: Science Meets Tradition
settings.content: Our products combine the latest Western scientific advancements and Eastern traditional healing methods. Natural remedies have been used for centuries - we didn't invent them - but we rigorously analyzed them through scientific research and studies ensuring that each ingredient we use is proven to be beneficial and safe for survivors, not just a fad.*

settings.heading: Superior Quality, Optimal Dosing
settings.content: Not all supplements are sourced, grown, or created equal. We choose partners who match our own high standards. Our ingredients are rigorously tested and checked before we craft them into your formulas. To maximize absorption and results, our experts group ingredients in AM and PM packets based on timing, meals, and body chemistry — ensuring potency with clinically-validated dosing in every one of our blends.

settings.heading: Survivor Safety
settings.content: When it comes to formulating supplements for Survivors, what our experts exclude from our blends is just as important as what they include in them. Our supplements are designed to be safe for survivors by avoiding ingredients that could promote their specific cancer type or interfere with pre-existing routines. Learn more here.

settings.heading: Empowering Survivors
settings.content: Our mission goes beyond high-quality personalized supplements—we're redefining post-cancer wellness by expanding education, fostering community, and promoting holistic well-being.

settings.title: Real Survivors, Real Reviews
settings.content: See what our community is saying about SurvivorRx

settings.title: Your Questions Deserve Answers
settings.subheading: Find answers to your most frequently asked questions

settings.title: How long after my cancer treatment can I start taking these supplements?
settings.content: Our supplements are designed to support recovery and overall wellness, but the ideal time to start will depend on your unique health situation. We recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before starting any new supplement after treatment. Our experts do not recommend starting sooner than at least 1 month after your last active treatment.

settings.title: Are your supplements manufactured in FDA-certified facilities and tested for quality and safety?
settings.content:
Yes, our supplements are produced in fully certified facilities that follow FDA regulations and Current Good Manufacturing Practices (CGMP). We hold both NSF and NPA certifications — NSF ensures our products are rigorously tested for contaminants and meet strict public health standards, while NPA certification confirms adherence to guidelines for purity, safety, and accurate labeling.

In addition, every batch is tested by accredited third-party laboratories to verify potency, confirm the correct dosage of active ingredients, and ensure the absence of harmful contaminants such as heavy metals or pesticides.

At SurvivorRx, quality isn’t just a marketing claim — it’s a core company value we stand behind.

settings.title: Do you have supplements focused on hormone-positive breast cancer survivors?
settings.content:
Yes! Our supplements are designed with a deep understanding of the unique health considerations of breast cancer survivors. SurvivorRx was co-founded by an integrative oncologist who, after years of clinical experience, saw the nutritional gaps in his patients. With input from his wife and other caregivers, he guided a team of pharmacists, naturopaths, and other experts in researching the safest, most beneficial ingredients. That research led to WellSurvivor Breast ER+, a formula designed with carefully selected nutrients that support overall wellness while avoiding ingredients that could interfere with SERM (Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulator) and AI (Aromatase Inhibitor) maintenance medications. All SurvivorRx supplements undergo purity testing to ensure quality and safety. We also offer WellSurvivor Breast ER-, formulated for hormone-negative survivors, along with other survivor-specific blends.

For the most personalized recommendation, take our quiz. As always, consult your healthcare provider before starting any supplements.

settings.title: Do you have supplements focused on prostate cancer survivors?
settings.content:
Yes! Our supplements are designed with a deep understanding of the unique health considerations of prostate cancer survivors. SurvivorRx was co-founded by an integrative oncologist who, after years of clinical experience, saw the nutritional gaps in his patients. With input from his wife and other caregivers, he guided a team of pharmacists, naturopaths, and other experts in researching the safest, most beneficial ingredients. That research led to WellSurvivor Prostate, along with other survivor-specific formulations.
We also offer WellSurvivor Prostate Max, designed for overall survivor wellness for those who had later stages of prostate cancer.

For the most personalized recommendation, take our quiz. As always, consult your healthcare provider before starting any supplements.

settings.title: How are these supplements designed to support the specific needs of all cancer survivors?
settings.content:
Our supplements are formulated with a deep understanding of the unique health considerations of cancer survivors. Developed through extensive research by a team of healthcare professionals—including oncologists, pharmacists, naturopaths, and scientists—our formulations are designed to support key aspects of recovery and long-term wellness.

We focus on key areas of health, incorporating ingredients that help maintain cellular function, promote immune system balance, and support the body's natural detoxification processes.

Each ingredient is chosen based on scientific research, and we take great care to ensure our formulas are free from unnecessary ingredients, additives or substances that could interfere with your health regimen. Inspired by the experiences of survivors and caregivers, our mission is to provide high-quality, research-driven support to help you navigate wellness with confidence.

settings.title: Do I need to have a history of prostate cancer to benefit from the WellSurvivor Prostate product?
settings.content: Not at all! This product is formulated to support all men’s whole-body wellness regardless of their history of prostate cancer. According to the National Cancer Institute, 1 in 8 men will develop prostate cancer at some point in their lives. Our formula is specifically crafted to promote prostate cellular defense while supporting healthy aging.

settings.title: Do I need to have a history of breast cancer to benefit from the WellSurvivor Breast product?
settings.content: Not at all! This product is formulated to support all women’s overall health regardless of their history of breast cancer. According to the National Cancer Institute, 1 in 8 women will develop breast cancer at some point in their lives. Our formula is specifically crafted to offer targeted support for healthy breast cell function and enhance immune resilience, while promoting long-term wellness for women.

settings.title: Can I cancel or change my subscription easily?
settings.content: Your health and well-being always come first! If your routine isn’t quite working for you, no worries—we make it easy to adjust, pause, or cancel your subscription anytime. We're here to support you every step of the way, making your wellness journey as smooth and stress-free as possible.

settings.title: Survivorship Simplified
settings.sub_title: Explore research-backed insights, expert wellness tips, and inspiring survivor stories on our blog

settings.subheading: Uplifting Lives, One Survivor at a Time

settings.text: When the big hospital doors close behind them, survivors begin a new chapter—one filled with hope, healing, and uncertainty. It’s the small, volunteer-driven organizations, those with tiny budgets but giant hearts, that step in to make a lasting impact. At SurvivorRx, we call them Tiny Loving Communities (TLCs). Our mission is to walk beside these amazing groups, shine a light on their work, and help ensure that no survivor walks alone.

settings.description: Ready to personalize your wellness journey? Take our quick, oncologist-designed quiz to get started.
